story: You hear a strange humming noise coming from deep within the shadows. Should you investigate or keep moving?

actions.action: Investigate the source of the humming noise
actions.good: As you cautiously approach, you discover an abandoned drone, left behind by a rival gang. You recover its advanced technology and enhance your cybernetic implants.
actions.bad: The humming noise leads you to a room filled with dangerous machinery, causing a massive explosion that damages you severely. The abandoned drone remains out of reach.

actions.good: Your quick thinking and swift footwork help you avoid any hazards and continue your mission unhindered.
actions.bad: The humming noise turns out to be a trap set by a rival gang member. You trigger an electric shock that causes damage, and you narrowly escape their grasp.
